text: Jacqueline Jill "Jackie" Collins OBE (4 October 1937 - 19 September 2015Born in 1937 as per findmypast.co.uk) was an English-American novelist. She wrote 32 novels, all of which have been on the New York Times bestsellers list. In total, her books have sold over 400 million copies and have been translated into 40 languages. Eight of the books were made into movies or television mini-series. She died on 19 September 2015 of breast cancer in Beverly Hills, California, aged 77.Jackie Collins Has Died She was the younger sister of Joan Collins. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American novelists Category:Cancer deaths in California Category:Deaths from breast cancer Category:English novelists Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:People from Hampstead Category:Writers from London
title: Jackie Collins
